channel.title: Subdomains? :)
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i13.tinypic.com/81zsm0z.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i3.tinypic.com/73eqxba.png[/img][center] [center]I made this topic for the benefit of the poorer members of the MITB community.There are quite a few people on these forums asking for free domains, help with domains etc. Obviously this is never going to happen. Subdomains are URL masks or redirects, which change your subdir into a short, memorable URL. There are a few really good ones out there which are fairly decent. I have posted a few, and I will update it on a regular basis. I really need your help though![/center]
[center]____[img]http://i9.tinypic.com/7yp4biv.png[/img] I have only posted a few, simply because I'm very tired. Another thing about this topic, is that I need your help! Do you know of any good subdomains? Let me know!
[b]1#[/b] - [i].CO.NR[/i] - http://www.freedomain.co.nr [sup]__________________________________________[/sup] [ul][li]Absolutely free, no time limit.[/li] [li][size=14pt]NO adverts.[/size][/li] [li]Choice between masking or forwarding.[/li] [li]Path forwarding.[/li] [li]Free META tag and dynamic IP support.[/li][/ul]
[b]2#[/b] - [i].TK[/i] - http://www.tk [sup]__________________________________________[/sup] [ul][li]Shortest available free domain.[/li] [li][size=14pt]Flexible adverts.[/size][/li] [li]Fast and simple registration.[/li] [li]5 domains per account.[/li] [li]Free META tag support.[/li][/ul]
[b]3#[/b] - [i].2YA, .vze..[/i] - http://www.shorturl.com [sup]__________________________________________[/sup] [ul][li]A wide selection of subdomains under 1 roof.[/li] [li][size=14pt]NO adverts[/size].[/li] [li]Fastest registration[/li] [li]Unlimited.[/li] [li]Free SEO.[/li][/ul]
[b]4#[/b] - [i].fx.to[/i] - http://www.fx.to [sup]__________________________________________[/sup] [ul][li]Niiice url, good for graphics or media.[/li] [li][size=14pt]Adult adverts.[/size][/li] [li]VERY fast registration.[/li] [li]Unlimited.[/li][/ul]
[b]5#[/b] - [i].any.to, any.at, eng.to, yaa.to..[/i] - http://www.any.to [sup]__________________________________________[/sup] [ul][li]A few nice short URLS.[/li] [li][size=14pt]NO adverts[/size][/li] [li]Instant registration.[/li] [li]Unlimited signups.[/li][/ul]
[b]6#[/b] - [i].surfhere.com..[/i] - http://hotredirect.com [sup]__________________________________________[/sup] [ul][li]A short and professional URL.[/li] [li][size=14pt]Banner ad[/size][/li] [li]Free stats, SEO, and submission! ;D[/li] [li]Multiple domain.[/li][/ul]
[b]7#[/b] - [i].rs-server.biz[/i] - http://rs-server.biz [sup]__________________________________________[/sup] [ul][li]A decent runescape related url.[/li] [li][size=14pt]NO Ads[/size][/li][/ul]
[/center]
TO BE CONTINUED..

item.title: Subdomains? :)
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

[quote=“JV, post:9, topic:168496”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=228098.msg1961005#msg1961005 date=1198962232]
You could sort the list based on the fact if they have ads or not. I would suggest .co.nr over .tk any day. I played Dungeon Siege years back and I remember a help site, it was a .tk site, it was good for a few months then filled with .tk ads. Put me off of ads for life.

you learn somthing new everyday
btw my free subdomain service is allmost setup just got to buy my domain name and change the name servers and wulla its done.

and JV will you add my sub domain service?[/quote]

When you’ve got it all set up and ready, I’ll add it to the list
-x

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote author=JV link=topic=228098.msg1961071#msg1961071 date=1198964142]

The Un-Named:

You could sort the list based on the fact if they have ads or not. I would suggest .co.nr over .tk any day. I played Dungeon Siege years back and I remember a help site, it was a .tk site, it was good for a few months then filled with .tk ads. Put me off of ads for life.

you learn somthing new everyday
btw my free subdomain service is allmost setup just got to buy my domain name and change the name servers and wulla its done.

and JV will you add my sub domain service?

Read full topic

item.title: Subdomains? :)
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

That’s what I think. Back in the day when I was teh neebzor, I used to have about six .TK sites. They used to promote themselves due to the fact they have no adverts. .TK is based on a small island called Tokelau, and it’s hard to get internet connection, or a decent server there. Because the demand for .TK domains was so great, they had to put in a hell of a lot more adverts to keep the server running.

-x

Read full topic

item.title: Subdomains? :)
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

[center][/center]

[center][center]
[center]I made this topic for the benefit of the poorer members of the MITB community.There are quite a few people on these forums asking for free domains, help with domains etc. Obviously this is never going to happen. Subdomains are URL masks or redirects, which change your subdir into a short, memorable URL. There are a few really good ones out there which are fairly decent. I have posted a few, and I will update it on a regular basis. I really need your help though![/center]

[center]____
I have only posted a few, simply because I’m very tired.
Another thing about this topic, is that I need your help!
Do you know of any good subdomains? Let me know!

1# - .CO.NR - http://www.freedomain.co.nr
[sup]__________________________________________[/sup]
[ul][li]Absolutely free, no time limit.[/li]
[li][size=14pt]NO adverts.[/size][/li]
[li]Choice between masking or forwarding.[/li]
[li]Path forwarding.[/li]
[li]Free META tag and dynamic IP support.[/li][/ul]

2# - .TK - http://www.tk
[sup]__________________________________________[/sup]
[ul][li]Shortest available free domain.[/li]
[li][size=14pt]Flexible adverts.[/size][/li]
[li]Fast and simple registration.[/li]
[li]5 domains per account.[/li]
[li]Free META tag support.[/li][/ul]

3# - .2YA, .vze… - http://www.shorturl.com
[sup]__________________________________________[/sup]
[ul][li]A wide selection of subdomains under 1 roof.[/li]
[li][size=14pt]NO adverts[/size].[/li]
[li]Fastest registration[/li]
[li]Unlimited.[/li]
[li]Free SEO.[/li][/ul]

4# - .fx.to - http://www.fx.to
[sup]__________________________________________[/sup]
[ul][li]Niiice url, good for graphics or media.[/li]
[li][size=14pt]Adult adverts.[/size][/li]
[li]VERY fast registration.[/li]
[li]Unlimited.[/li][/ul]

5# - .any.to, any.at, eng.to, yaa.to… - http://www.any.to
[sup]__________________________________________[/sup]
[ul][li]A few nice short URLS.[/li]
[li][size=14pt]NO adverts[/size][/li]
[li]Instant registration.[/li]
[li]Unlimited signups.[/li][/ul]

6# - .surfhere.com… - http://hotredirect.com
[sup]__________________________________________[/sup]
[ul][li]A short and professional URL.[/li]
[li][size=14pt]Banner ad[/size][/li]
[li]Free stats, SEO, and submission! ;D[/li]
[li]Multiple domain.[/li][/ul]

7# - .rs-server.biz - http://rs-server.biz
[sup]__________________________________________[/sup]
[ul][li]A decent runescape related url.[/li]
[li][size=14pt]NO Ads[/size][/li][/ul]

[/center]

TO BE CONTINUED…
